p.b: Which sentence shows the best usage of the word although?

simpleChoice.p: Allison, although, had studied, but she still felt unprepared for the math quiz.
Allison had although studied, she still felt unprepared for the math quiz.
Allison had studied; she still felt unprepared for the math quiz although.
Although Allison had studied, she still felt unprepared for the math quiz.
